reads.reason: Models often read data from other models for relationships or data integrity.
Routers typically read from models to handle incoming requests.
Services may read from models to generate or manipulate data.
Schemas read from models to validate and serialize data.

writes.reason: Routers may write to models to persist data based on user actions.
Services may write to models to create or update records.
Services may write to models to generate outputs based on data.
